item.title: Big big problem!
item.dc:creator: @universallas universallas
item.description:
@universallas wrote:

hello before i say a problem i tell to you all used all possibles clients and all possibles servers and is all time same so i think is maybe problem in code when teleportin with magic pool. used 1166 and 1155 it is same errors
it is edgevile bank after teleport from mage bank

try to teleport 10000000000 times… .same
here is code. can any 1 see any problems? server compiling no errors… runing no errors

} public void handleTeleporting() { while (System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getLastMoved() < 10000 && owner.getLocation().inWilderness()) { owner.getActionSender().sendMessage("@whi@You must stand still for 10 seconds before using portal"); return; } String[] main = new String[]{"Somewhere", "somnewhere"}; owner.setMenuHandler(new MenuHandler(main) { public void handleReply(int option, String response) { if(option == 0 && System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getCombatTimer() > 10000) { owner.setLocation(Point.location(220, 450), true); owner.resetPath(); } else if(option == 1 && System.currentTimeMillis() - owner.getCombatTimer() > 10000) { owner.setLocation(Point.location(220, 450), true); owner.resetPath(); } } }); owner.getActionSender().sendMenu(main); }
any help ? tx allot ( tested server easyrsc, rscdv25. pp2p. extrimpk) clients … lot of them like 5
